name: Jesus Rodriguez
text: We were attended to and allowed to sit where we wanted to.  This was the first time we really didn't have to wait on our pizza. Fast and Friendly service.  Mark Chavaria the night manager and staff were nice, fast, and Friendly. Keep up the good work Mark.

name: John Sheets
text: Customer service can be pretty decent if you get the right person. However, there a lot of the wrong people working there too. The eating area usually makes you want to break out the hand sanitizer and keep the kids from touching anything. The pizza is fine- typical pizza hut. The wings are surprisingly good.

name: Rich Young
text: Typical Pizza Hut. I found the service to be just like any other pizza place. I placed my order to go and in about 15 minutes it was ready to go. I had a medium thin and crispy two topping pizza and a soda both were good just like the Pizza Hut standard. The servers were nice and respectful as well.
